channel.title: builds image builds
channel.description:
New forum thread to discuss Whonix image builds.
Now attempting to build `16.0.5.3-developers-only`. With become the next point relese. Comes with:
* updated deb.torproject.org signing key -> https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593/23 * `tor` `0.4.7.8` security fix -> https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-integration-in-whonix/10593/24 * Tor Browser `11.0.14` -> https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-browser-integration/11912/15 * Complete changelog if this becomes the next point release in the usual release announcement.

item.title: builds image builds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
CI Whonix Testing 
Err:4 http://HTTPS///fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease
  500  SSL error: wrong version number [IP: 127.0.0.1 3142]

Created update issue - fasttrack: 500 SSL error: wrong version number for it.

Down the dependency chain, this currently breaks the Whonix build process.

Read full topic

item.title: builds image builds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
16.0.5.3 of course. Why build 16.0.5.1, a later version if there is a newer version 16.0.5.3 with a corresponding stable release from yesterday? Did I somehow create confusion to imply that?

Read full topic

item.title: builds image builds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
New forum thread to discuss Whonix image builds.

Now attempting to build 16.0.5.3-developers-only. With become the next point relese. Comes with:

  • updated deb.torproject.org signing key → Tor integration in Whonix - #23 by Patrick
  • tor 0.4.7.8 security fix → Tor integration in Whonix - #24 by Patrick
  • Tor Browser 11.0.14 → Tor Browser Integration - #15 by Patrick
  • Complete changelog if this becomes the next point release in the usual release announcement.

Read full topic
